meanings.definition: A type of plastid found in plant cells that is responsible for the synthesis and storage of starch.
meanings.sent1: Amyloplasts help plants make and store starch.
meanings.sent2: The amyloplasts in the cell are full of starch.
meanings.sent3: The amyloplasts had a party storing all that starch!
meanings.sent4: Amyloplasts are like tiny starch factories inside plant cells.
meanings.sent5: In the world of plant cells, amyloplasts are the starch heroes.

meanings.definition: Organelles that are involved in the conversion of glucose into starch in plant cells.
meanings.sent1: Glucose turns into starch thanks to amyloplasts.
meanings.sent2: The process of starch production involves amyloplasts.
meanings.sent3: The amyloplasts were busy turning glucose into starch, like little chefs.
meanings.sent4: Amyloplasts act as the starch transformation centers in plant cells.
meanings.sent5: Amyloplasts work hard behind the scenes to convert glucose into starch.
